summary: Provides the core neural network building blocks for the VITS text‑to‑speech architecture, including encoders, flow‑based latent transformations, duration predictors, attention mechanisms, and adversarial discriminators, enabling end‑to‑end training and inference of high‑fidelity speech synthesis models.
business_intent: Facilitate the development and deployment of state‑of‑the‑art neural TTS systems by supplying reusable PyTorch modules that implement the VITS model components for commercial speech generation services.
